title: LF Bronze Top, Mid, Jungle for serious  ranked climbing & improvement
body:
As above we're looking for a top, mid and jg mains to take climbing in ranked seriously and help each other to improve. I'm an adc main and already have a strong support. Add me for any queries ; KillVearn

EDIT : only jungle role is left

replies.body: Added you, im a jungle main :)

Hey guys,
 I have only just got back into league of legends and have had a pretty decent break, I have been up  near gold a long time ago and stopped playing .
Now I am looking for regular people to ranked and duo que with toget out of bronze hell. 
add me 

cheers

hi im a b1 jg main well u could say im b1 but im s5 on my other account where i main supp and mid i dont have a very big champion pool in the jg yet but i want to expand on it add me in game if ur interested
B2 Jungle main, i main Lee, Rengar, Kha, Elise and Ekko but i can diversify if need be :D
hey bud, im a jungler main. i just added you "JohnsonDaily" hit me up if youre keen to que
Hey I've been maining top/mid to try and climb my way out of bronze, have a large champion pool. Add me to talk :)
Hi there I'm a top and mid main with a massive champion pool so I have a wide variety of champs I can play add me if your interested
Hey Fitzky, thanks for commenting I've added you in game so let's talk.

i like to join you guys used to main top but havent play league for a while 
Gold V atm
